name: 10SecondSpaceWar
description: In 10SecondSpaceWar, you find yourself in a perilous situation where you're aboard a spaceship that's about to explode in just 10 seconds! However, there's a glimmer of hope: every enemy ship you manage to destroy grants you extra time to stay alive. Your objective is to take them down as quickly as possible. But be careful, as time is always running out! With each passing moment, the clock ticks closer and closer to zero. Can you use your wits and quick reflexes to survive the onslaught of enemy ships and stay alive for as long as possible?
